name: Soccer Kickoff World
description:
It's a kickoff world tournament that the fans in the largest stadium ever built have been waiting for. The goal is simple, kick the ball as far as you can.

To play, simply tap the screen once to select the angle of the kick. Tap it again to select the power of your kick and to send it on its way. How far can you kick it? Time the angle and power just and you will kick the ball farther and farther every time.

To unlock a country try and have the ball collide with the flags. A flag will fly by every few seconds. Try and unlock all 250 flags!

Watch out for these special cards.
Kick card will give you an huge boost
Bounce card will bounce the ball higher
Momentum card will move your ball faster.
A Star card will give you more stars

Beware of the penalty cards!
A Yellow card will slow you down.
A Red cards will stop you cold.
A Bang card will loose you stars and one flag in that game.

A mystery card could be any one of the special or penalty cards.

NEW IN 6.0.0
250 Countries Now Represented!!!
Fixed High Score saving
New ball selection page.
Updated game to work with all new iOS versions
